summary: REQ-2 appears implemented by setting a darker (more opaque) linear-gradient overlay (rgba alpha 0.7) on the global html background-image for both the default and the mobile/portrait @media rule, while keeping the specified background image URLs and preserving cover/center/no-repeat/fixed behavior. Two additional files were modified (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) that are not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified internal tracking/metadata file project_state.json (e.g., new_feature_requests entries marked pending) despite the BuildRequest only requesting a CSS overlay darkness adjustment.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement in the BuildRequest asks to update project tracking/state files; only frontend/src/index.css overlay alpha values were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/generated broad frontend file summaries in frontend-file-summaries.txt, including descriptions of many components and features unrelated to darkening the background overlay.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request documentation/summary generation; only a specific CSS change in frontend/src/index.css.
